properties.entry: INSERT INTO system_elements( element_type, element_name, element_folder, element_description, element_content, element_class, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) VALUES (:element_type, :element_name, :element_folder, :element_description, :element_content, :element_class, :created_at, :created_by, :updated_at, :updated_by)
SELECT id, element_type, element_name, element_folder, element_description, element_content, element_class, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM system_elements WHERE id=:id

SELECT id, element_type, element_name, element_folder, element_description, element_content, element_class, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM system_elements WHERE element_name=:element_name AND element_folder=:element_folder

SELECT id, element_type, element_name, element_folder, element_description, element_content, element_class, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM system_elements WHERE element_folder=:element_folder AND element_type IN (:element_types)

SELECT id, element_type, element_name, element_folder, element_description, element_content, element_class, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM system_elements WHERE element_type in (:element_types)

UPDATE system_elements SET element_type=:element_type, element_name=:element_name, element_folder=:element_folder, element_description=:element_description, element_content=:element_content, element_class=:element_class, created_at=:created_at, created_by=:created_by, updated_at=:updated_at, updated_by=:updated_by WHERE id=:id
DELETE FROM system_elements WHERE created_at<:created_at AND element_type IN (:element_types)
DELETE FROM system_elements WHERE element_name=:element_name AND element_folder=:element_folder
DELETE FROM system_elements WHERE element_folder=:element_folder AND element_type IN (:element_types)
DELETE FROM system_elements WHERE element_name=:element_name AND element_type IN (:element_types)
UPDATE system_elements SET element_class=:element_class WHERE id=:id
DELETE FROM system_elements WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT ON (element_class) id FROM system_elements ORDER BY element_class, created_at DESC NULLS LAST, element_class);
